title: Joel McHale üôè
description:
Joel McHale (Becky, The Darkest Timeline podcast) talks to Justin about his experience working with Chevy Chase on Community, why he and Ken Jeong started their podcast, and Joel opens up about the challenges he faces as an actor with dyslexia.
